supportData.title: Marketing and Influencing
descr: We provide Community Management, SMM, Paid Traffic, PR, KOLs.
We will increase your community, attract investors and partners.
We provide strong support from the involved KOLs to increase the initial outreach of your project. Our KOL has a global audience in Asia, Europe, North and South America.

supportData.title: Fundraising and Partnerships
descr: We invest our own funds in projects, and also help to attract them through our 40+ venture capitalists

supportData.title: Development and Audit
descr: We will introduce you to audit companies and help you pass their accreditation
We help you attract strong technical specialists and developers to your team
Our R&D team is dedicated to help release your product quickly under high standards of quality and security

supportData.title: Token Launch and listing
descr: We will introduce you to 30+ launchpads, 10+ exchanges and 70+ partners to launch the best product.

crocs.title: Crypto Ventures
crocs.descr: Often, two minds are greater than one. That is true in both personal life and in business. Any business that hasn`t formally filed as a corporate entity (such as a corporation or limited liability company) and that has two or more individuals working together is a common law partnership.
